casebody.data:
The ALLIANCE TO END CHICKENS AS KAPOROS, et al., Appellants,
v.
NEW YORK CITY POLICE DEPARTMENT, et al., Respondents, et al., Defendants. 2018-331 Court of Appeals of New York. March 29, 2018 Motion by Agudath Israel of America for leave to appear amicus curiae on the appeal herein granted only to the extent that the proposed brief is accepted as filed.

The brief must be submitted in digital format within seven days.

Judge Feinman took no part.
